lead_paragraph: GOLDENBERG--Billie (Wallens), always the spirited light that brightened the room, she was loyally devoted to all whom she loved. Her life was filled with appreciation for arts, design and culture from New York to Florida. Billie passed on June 25 at age 64. She is survived by her father Eugene Wallens, husband Leon Goldenberg; daughters Lisa Toledano and husband Andy Toledano and Amy Tebbi and husband David Tebbi, and brother Bob Wallens and wife Shelly. Memorial service: Riverside Chapel, 76th and Amsterdam, Wednesday, June 29, 5pm. Memorial hours: The Phillips Club, West 66th St., Wednesday, 6:30-9pm; Thursday, Saturday and Sunday, 12-3pm and 5-8pm; Friday, 12-5pm. In lieu of flowers, the family requests that donations be made to the National Alliance on Mental Illness. 1/3
